title: Nine Inch Nails Ghosts I-IV 5.1 Sampler
description:
This is only a preview of the Ghosts DVD that will be released as soon as all the multitracks are released.

DVD authoring, design, surround sound mixed by Erik Macedo (demo @ ETS)


Read your booklets or visit ghosts.nin.com for recording information for the album. 

THIS IS NOT THE FINAL VERSION AND DOES NOT REPRESENT THE FINAL OUTCOME THE DVD.

This is a test, but the songs included are the final versions. Should there be difference, it will be noted.


Any questions regarding this download, you can contact me at the message board Echoing The Sound (http://www.echoingthesound.org/) and my SN is demo.

Thanks,
Erik.
